charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Chiyo (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) has been summoned back from the afterlife. She may not like it but she will do her best to help her opponents out with information while she is forced to fight.

abilities.name: White Secret Technique Ten Puppets
abilities.description: Using White Secret Technique Ten Puppets Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) targets one enemy stunning  their physical and ranged skills for 1 turn. One random enemy will be dealt 20 damage for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Possum
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Chiyo plays Possum on one enemy. If that enemy uses a harmful skill it will be countered and will receive 20 damage while having their physical skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: White Secret Art Illusion
abilities.description: Using White Secret Art Illusion Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) targets one enemy dealing 20 damage. Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) will ignore non-ranged enemy skills for 1 turn when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Puppet Master Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
